descriptions.deepfake: Financial fraud detection ke liye comprehensive video analysis. YouTube videos aur doosre media analyze karta hai - deepfakes, impersonation, jhoothe daave, manipulated content, aur unauthorized financial advice ke liye. Hamare AI investors ki safety ke liye video, audio, metadata aur content claims check karta hai.
descriptions.social: WhatsApp, Telegram aur social media par pump-and-dump schemes, fake investment tips, Ponzi schemes aur coordinated market manipulation attempts monitor karta hai.
descriptions.announcement: Historical data se cross-reference karke, compliance requirements check karke aur suspicious patterns detect karke corporate announcements ki authenticity verify karta hai.
descriptions.sebiQuery: Comprehensive SEBI registry intelligence access kariye. Instantly broker registrations verify kariye, Alternative Investment Funds search kariye, multi-segment operators identify kariye, aur AI-powered natural language search ke saath 4,923+ registered intermediaries analyze kariye.

inputLabels.general: Analysis ke liye suspicious content enter kariye

placeholders.deepfake: YouTube URL, transcript, ya suspicious video/audio ka description paste kariye...
placeholders.social: WhatsApp/Telegram message ya social media post paste kariye...
placeholders.announcement: Corporate announcement ya news paste kariye...
placeholders.sebiQuery:
SEBI ke official registry database mein search kariye...

Search examples:
• Verify kariye ki kya Zerodha SEBI registered hai
• Saare Alternative Investment Funds list kariye
• Multi-segment financial operators find kariye
• 'Capital' naam waale brokers search kariye
• Database statistics aur insights paayiye

titles.deepfake: AI Video Analysis progress mein hai

analysis.importantTips: 💡 Important: Video Fraud kaise spot karein

results.fraudReportingText: Is content ko potential fraud ke roop mein flag kiya gaya hai. Doosre investors ki safety ke liye turant report kariye.
results.fileComplaint: 🚨 SEBI SCORES Portal par Complaint file kariye
results.saveEvidence: 💡 Report karne se pehle saare evidence (screenshots, URLs, transcripts) save kariye
